diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Prostatic adenocarcinoma, Gleason score 8, recurrent after prostatectomy and radiation treatment.
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis was based on the pathological findings from the radical prostatectomy and the elevated PSA level 18 months post-surgery. The Gleason score of 8 indicated aggressive disease, and the assessment showed no evidence of local or distant metastasis at that time, despite the elevated PSA.
